price: Amekuteremshia Kitabu kwa haki, kinacho sadikisha yaliyo kuwa kabla yake. Na aliteremsha Taurati na Injili .
arabic: نَزَّلَ عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَأَنزَلَ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلَ
footnotes: Umeteremshiwa wewe, Muhammad, hii Qur'ani yenye kukusanya ukweli wa misingi yote ya Sharia ya Mbinguni iliomo katika Vitabu vilivyo tangulia. Na hakika kabla ya Qur'ani Mwenyezi Mungu alikwisha teremsha Taurati kwa Musa, na Injili kwa Isa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: nazzala ʿalayka al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi muṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi wa-anzala al-tawrāta wal-injīla
